name: Beth  Harkins
what_you_do: Beth Harkins is an author and transformational writing mentor who helps women writers claim their voices and share their stories through writing.
who_you_serve: She serves women writers, particularly those in the Sage Stage of life, who are looking to write their stories and overcome self-doubt.
signature_programs: The Possibility of Everywhere: Casablanca to Oklahoma City, Kathmandu to Timbuktu
bio: Award-winning author of The Possibility of Everywhere, speaker on global stages, and experienced writing mentor.
business_focus: Beth Harkins is an author and transformational writing mentor who helps women writers claim their voices and share their stories through writing. (writing mentorship)
